attributes.action: not disband the Defence Export Services Organisation (DESO) and transfer defence trade support to UK T&I from the MOD.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For the past forty years the UK Government has supported the legal export of defence equipment through a dedicated team located within the MOD. Today it was announced that this support will be transferred to UK T&I. This change in policy risks drastically reducing the support given to UK defence companies, and could significantly affect our defence relationships with other countries.
